title: The Secret __hello__ Module
shortDescription: Python has a hidden __hello__ module that prints a simple greeting!
detailedDescription: Among Python's easter eggs is the __hello__ module. When you import it, it simply prints 'Hello world!' to the console. This is one of several hidden modules that showcase the Python community's sense of humor and attention to delightful details.
examples: # Try this in your Python interpreter:
import this  # The Zen of Python
import antigravity  # Opens a web comic
# You can also check what's in the module:
# These easter eggs show Python's fun culture!
